Class SimpleMatrixf44

java.lang.Object
  com.se.simplicity.vector.ArrayBackedObjectf
      com.se.simplicity.vector.SimpleMatrixf44
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matrixf, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleTransformationMatrixf44
public class SimpleMatrixf44
extends ArrayBackedObjectf
implements Matrixf

A 4x4 dimensional matrix that stores its data in a float array.

Author:
Gary Buyn
See Also:

invert

public void invert()
            throws SEInvalidOperationException

NOTE: This method uses Cramer's Rule to compute the inverse (computes many determinants). Gaussian Elimination could be a more efficient means of computing the inverse.

Specified by:
invert in interface Matrixf
Throws:
SEInvalidOperationException - Thrown if this SimpleMatrixf44 has a determinant of 0.
